system.requirements: Adeptus Sororitas Career, DH Rank 5+. Fully Ordained Sister, undergoign Ritual Fasting, who wish to undertake a suitably pure oath to atone for the sins of another.

description.value:
The Repentia of the Sisters of Battle seek to atone for their own sins. The Oblatia however seek to atone for the sins of another, perhaps a blood relative, an infamous ancestor, or a stain on their family line. They atone through deeeds, through slaying of humanities enemies, and sacrifice such as earn forgiveness in the eyes of The Emperor.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Sister Oblatia Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Duty unto Death
